siteTitle: JungleCode - Navigate Japan's Healthcare Market with Confidence

hero.title: Enter Japan’s Healthcare Market
hero.subtitle: Bring your innovation to the world’s third-largest healthcare economy with local expertise and trusted access.

about.title: You Build Healthcare Innovation. We Help You Land It in Japan.
about.description: JungleCode helps global healthcare and healthtech ventures succeed in Japan — bridging regulation, culture, and clinical practice. From PMDA pathways to hospital adoption, we guide you with clarity and precision so your innovation improves patient outcomes here.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To accelerate adoption of transformative healthcare technologies in Japan — delivering patient impact while navigating regulation and culture with care.

keyPoints.title: Healthcare Insight
keyPoints.description: We understand Japan’s health system — from PMDA approvals to hospital workflows.

keyPoints.title: Strategic Entry
keyPoints.description: From first discussions to scale, we guide each step of your market journey.

keyPoints.title: Trusted Access
keyPoints.description: We connect you with hospitals, KOLs, and decision-makers who shape adoption.

challenges.title: Healthcare Challenges We Solve
challenges.intro: Japan’s healthcare market is highly structured and risk-averse. We help you move through barriers like regulation, provider adoption, and reimbursement with strategies that work locally.

challenges.title: PMDA Approval
challenges.challenge: Device classification, Shonin approval, and trials are complex and slow.
challenges.solution: We map pathways, guide consultations, and plan evidence for faster approval.

challenges.title: Data Privacy
challenges.challenge: Japan’s PIPA and medical data rules are strict and often misunderstood.
challenges.solution: We ensure compliance, design secure workflows, and protect patient trust.

challenges.title: Risk-Averse Culture
challenges.challenge: Hospitals wait for local data and KOL endorsements before adoption.
challenges.solution: We generate Japanese evidence and secure KOL champions to build trust.

challenges.title: Hospital Integration
challenges.challenge: Unique EMRs and limited interoperability slow technical adoption.
challenges.solution: We adapt your solution to major EMRs and align with hospital workflows.

challenges.title: NHI Coverage
challenges.challenge: National Health Insurance requires proof of cost-effectiveness or superiority.
challenges.solution: We prepare health economics cases and guide Chuikyo negotiations.

challenges.title: Pricing Pressure
challenges.challenge: Innovation value must balance with biennial price revisions.
challenges.solution: We design pricing for early traction and long-term sustainability.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: From PMDA to reimbursement, we guide each step of your Japan entry.

primary.title: Regulatory Strategy
primary.description: Navigate Japan’s regulatory system with confidence — from PMDA pathways to reimbursement positioning.

secondary.title: Provider Engagement
secondary.description: Build adoption with Japan’s medical community through trusted access.

secondary.title: Localization
secondary.description: Adapt your solution for Japan’s clinical context — beyond translation.

steps.title: Regulatory Review
steps.description: We assess classification, map requirements, and define evidence needs.

steps.title: Market Planning
steps.description: We design strategies for validation, provider engagement, and reimbursement.

steps.title: Pilots & Launch
steps.description: From PMDA submissions to hospital pilots, we support local rollout.

steps.title: Scale
steps.description: We grow adoption, optimize reimbursement, and strengthen operations.

whyJapan.title: Why Japan
whyJapan.intro: Japan’s super-aged society and universal coverage make it one of the world’s most urgent and attractive healthcare markets.

sections.title: Market Dynamics
items: 28% of population over 65, rising further by 2040
Government funding digital health under Society 5.0

sections.title: Key Advantages
items: Government mandate for digital health and AI
Culture of precision aligned with medical standards

sections.title: Success Factors
items: Long-term trust is required for scale

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.subtitle: Work with partners who understand Japan’s clinical and cultural complexity.

contact.title: Request Consultation
contact.subtitle: Share your healthcare innovation and timeline. We’ll outline your path to approval, adoption, and success in Japan.

formPlaceholders.name: Full name
formPlaceholders.industry: e.g., Digital therapeutics, Remote monitoring, Clinical diagnostics, Digital pathology
formPlaceholders.objectives: What outcomes and goals do you aim to achieve in Japan?

footer.tagline: Your partner for healthcare innovation in Japan.

team.name: Jet Villegas
team.bio: A builder, operator, and investor with 25+ years in global technology and healthcare. Jet has led engineering operations in Tokyo and San Francisco, bridging medical AI with Japan’s regulatory system. His expertise spans healthcare software, device localization, and workflow integration, with deep ties to hospitals and regulators.

team.name: Aditya Pandya
team.bio: A product leader with 15+ years in digital platforms and 5+ years in Japan. While in Tokyo, he scaled global platforms reaching over 100M people, including healthcare-adjacent products, while navigating regulatory and cultural complexities. His career includes building products in regulated environments with a focus on privacy, safety, and global scalability.
